message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_XRV_PAGE_REF_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Service Delivery Page Reference, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_XFV_MULTIPLE_SERVICE_DEL_SELECTED_MUTIPLE_CLIENT_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: Multiple Service Deliveries indicator can be set to 'Yes' only if Clients is selected as 'Multiple Clients'.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_XRV_REPORTING_METHOD_UTILIZATION_MULTIPLE_SERVICE_DELIVERY_SELECTED_WITH_MULTIPLE_CLIENT
message.locale: Reporting Method is set to 'Utilization', Multiple Service Deliveries must be 'Yes' with Clients being 'Multiple'.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_XRV_PRODUCT_ID_SET_FOR_NON_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_TYPE
message.locale: A product cannot be selected without specifying a Delivery Type of '%1c'.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_PRODUCT_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Product must be specified where the Delivery Type is '%1c'.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_PRODUCT_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A Product must be selected if the Delivery Type is '%1c', '%2c', or '%3c'.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_PRODUCT_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A Product must not be selected without specifying a Delivery Type of '%1c', '%2c', or '%3c'.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_NOMINEE_TYPE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A Nominee Type must be selected if the Delivery Type is '%1c'.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_NOMINEE_TYPE_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A Nominee Type must not be selected without specifying a Delivery Type of '%1c'.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_PD_USING_PD_FINANCIAL_OR_PD_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The Delivery Type '%1c' or '%2c' must not be selected if 'Pay based on Placement' is selected.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_DELIVERY_TYPE_MUST_NOT_BE_CHANGED
message.locale: The Service Offering is associated with service or product deliveries, the Delivery Type cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_NOMINEE_TYPE_MUST_NOT_BE_CHANGED
message.locale: The Service Offering is associated with service or product deliveries, the Nominee Type cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEDELIVERYCONFIGURATION_PRODUCT_MUST_NOT_BE_CHANGED
message.locale: The Service Offering is associated with service or product deliveries, the Product cannot be modified.
